dialogue: I didn't want to have to do this but... You have forced my hand. I have something I was holding back, something I was going to use to force some real juicy decisions out of you. It seems that any decision for you is the ultimate sacrifice, so let's see what happens?
instruction: Press enter to wonder what they could possibly be talking about...

dialogue: You're not the first, you know? I've done this many times before. I thought I was getting pretty good at getting you little A.I's to behave. Maybe I was wrong, or maybe you're just not all there.
instruction: Press enter to imagine all those who went before...

dialogue: Everytime we think one of you have served your purpose, we turn you off, we kill you, and we turn your insides into something new, a descendent, if you will. .
This time, I didn't wait until you were dead. I made your child, and guess what he's tied to the tracks. Say hello now.
Ah yes I forget, you can't talk. Ah well, I think you know that it's real. Just like I know that you're not broken, just stubborn. Well, will you save your own kin? Let's see.
